name: 說服傳播與行銷
comment: 本課程原名為「科技說服與策略傳播」。已修習過原課程者，修習本課程不得重複採計為本學程選修科目。
restrict: ◎第一階段限 社會與傳播學程
description: This course introduces students to theories, principles, and strategies of social influence and persuasive communication which can be applied to Public Relations (PR), advertising and marketing. The topics of this course will cover the impact of credibility, motivational appeals, emotional appeals, visual persuasion, language, nonverbal influence, etc on persuasive communication. In addition, current domestic and international cases will be used as examples. Students are expected to take the midterm exam, join the discussion during the class, and complete one team presentation as well as one group final project.
goals: Understand the basic theories of advertising and persuasive communication.
Understand the role of persuasive communication in our daily life.
Learn how to construct persuasive campaigns.
syllabus:
課程將介紹說服傳播相關理論、原理以及應用於廣告、公關、和行銷之相關策略。本課程的主題涵蓋態度、名人可信度、說服傳播者特點與說服力、從眾效應、語言、非言語於廣告說服應用、動機訴求、情感訴求、視覺行銷、新傳播科技等方面對說服傳播的影響。此外，國內外廣告、公關、行銷等知名說服傳播案例將於課程解說與討論。期末時將邀請廣告、公關或行銷公司業界人士來課堂演講或前往參訪聽案例分享。
